mapper.select: SELECT t1.cameraId AS 'regionId', t1.cameraId AS 'regionCode', t1.cameraName AS 'regionName', t1.villageCode AS 'parentId', t1.createTime AS 'createdTime', t1.gisType, t1.lon, t1.lat, t1.cameraType AS state, 8 AS 'regionType', t1.updateTime FROM cw_base_camera t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_village t2 ON t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode WHERE t1.state=0 AND t1.villageCode IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, streamSource FROM cw_base_camera WHERE cameraId = #{cameraId}
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(villageCode SEPARATOR ',') AS villageCodes FROM (SELECT villageCode FROM cw_base_camera GROUP BY villageCode) AS temp
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(orgCode SEPARATOR ',') AS orgCodes FROM (SELECT villageCode, orgCode FROM cw_base_village GROUP BY orgCode) AS temp WHERE FIND_IN_SET(villageCode, #{villageCodes})
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(PARENT_ID SEPARATOR ',') AS cityCodes FROM (SELECT REGION_CODE, PARENT_ID FROM cw_ge_region_info GROUP BY REGION_CODE) AS temp WHERE FIND_IN_SET(REGION_CODE, #{orgCodes})

SELECT t1.REGION_ID AS 'regionId', t1.REGION_CODE AS 'regionCode', t1.REGION_NAME AS 'regionName', t1.PARENT_ID AS 'parentId', t1.CREATED_TIME AS 'createdTime', t1.gisCenter, t1.gisArea, t1.gisType, t1.pinyin, t1.regionType, t1.updateTime FROM cw_ge_region_info t1 WHERE t1.state=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(t1.REGION_ID , #{regionIds})

SELECT t1.REGION_ID AS 'regionId', t1.REGION_CODE AS 'regionCode', t1.REGION_NAME AS 'regionName', t1.PARENT_ID AS 'parentId', t1.CREATED_TIME AS 'createdTime', t1.gisCenter, t1.gisArea, t1.gisType, t1.pinyin, t1.regionType, t1.updateTime FROM cw_ge_region_info t1 WHERE t1.state=1 AND FIND_IN_SET(t1.REGION_CODE , #{regions})

SELECT t1.villageCode AS 'regionId', t1.villageCode AS 'regionCode', t1.villageName AS 'regionName', t2.REGION_NAME, t2.REGION_ID AS 'parentId', t1.createTime AS 'createdTime', t1.gisCenter, t1.gisArea, t1.gisType, t1.lon, t1.lat, t1.pinyin, 7 AS 'regionType', t1.updateTime FROM cw_base_village t1 LEFT JOIN cw_ge_region_info t2 ON t1.orgCode = t2.REGION_CODE WHERE t1.state=0 AND FIND_IN_SET(t1.villageCode,#{villageCodes})
